text: Muzoba sanga abandi bipfuza kuronka amahoro kuri mwebwe n’ukuronka amahoro kubantu babo, rero uko basubijwe mundyane baca batabwa muri izo ndyane zabo bubitse inda zabo, rero nibata vavanura namwe canke kubazanira amahoro canke kuzitira amaboko yabo, rero nimubafate mubice aho muzobasanga, abo rero nibo tubahaye hejuru yabo nivyo bimenyetso biri k’umugaragaro
